bibl.title: A Guide to the Antiquities of the Fayum.
bibl.note: Deals with the history and archaeology of the province, describing nineteen sites, their monuments and inscriptions, and the research work done on them.
bibl.seg: Lane Mary Ellen, A Guide to the Antiquities of the Fayum.
Cairo, American University Press, 1985, 8°, 119 pp., figg., dessins, plans, cartes.
Deals with the history and archaeology of the province, describing nineteen sites, their monuments and inscriptions, and the research work done on them.
